meanings.definition: A place of worship for Muslims.
meanings.sent1: Many people gather at the masjids to pray together.
meanings.sent2: The masjids in our town have beautiful architecture.
meanings.sent3: The masjids always seem to have the most peaceful atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: The masjids stand tall like guardians of faith.
meanings.sent5: The call to prayer echoes through the masjids, filling the air with devotion.

meanings.sent1: We visited many masjids during our trip.
meanings.sent2: The masjids we saw were all unique in their designs.
meanings.sent3: It felt like the masjids were having a secret meeting.
meanings.sent4: The masjids dotted the landscape like jewels in a crown.
meanings.sent5: The masjids symbolize unity and community among Muslims.
